Indiana University
Media Digitization and Preservation Initiative (MDPI)
Submission Information Package - Preservation and Production
------------------------------------------------------------

The following files are included in this package:
  data/generated/README.txt - this file
  data/MDPI_40000000054496.xml - Metadata from digitizing facility (includes digiprov and original MD5s)
  data/MDPI_40000000054496_01_access.mp4 - Master access file for sequence 01
  data/MDPI_40000000054496_01_pres.eqm - Master preservation file for sequence 01
  data/MDPI_40000000054496_01_pres.wav - Master preservation file for sequence 01
  data/MDPI_40000000054496_01_pres.wmf - Master preservation file for sequence 01
  data/MDPI_40000000054496_01_prod.wav - Master production file for sequence 01
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_access_ffprobe.xml - Technical metadata for access master file sequence 01; generated by ffprobe
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_high.mp4 - Streaming derivative for sequence 01 at high quality
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_high_ffprobe.xml - Technical metadata for (unknown-use) master file sequence 01; generated by ffprobe
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_med.mp4 - Streaming derivative for sequence 01 at med quality
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_med_ffprobe.xml - Technical metadata for (unknown-use) master file sequence 01; generated by ffprobe
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_pres_ffprobe.xml - Technical metadata for preservation master file sequence 01; generated by ffprobe
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_prod_audioinspector_bad.xml - AudioInspector quality analysis for production master file sequence 01.  Quality estimate: bad.
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_01_prod_ffprobe.xml - Technical metadata for production master file sequence 01; generated by ffprobe
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_group.txt - Physical object group information
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_mods.xml - Descriptive metadata for this object in MODS format.
  data/generated/MDPI_40000000054496_pod.xml - Data dump of the POD record for this object.

Please note:  the physical format metadata stored in the POD dump was
an estimate prior to digitization.  The physical format metadata from
the digitizing facility accurately represents the physical object and
should be used in any analysis.

Unit information in the .mkv and .mov header for video files may be
incorrect if the text is 'Archives of African American Music and
Culture.
